content: for about 5 minutes then check to see how it is felting do not let the water drain out or go to rinse cycle but continue to check every 5 minutes until hat has reached desired amount of felting sample hat took about 10 minutes to felt keep resetting machine to agitation cycle if necessary until hat is desired size remove from washer and rinse thoroughly in lukewarm water in sink press between dry towels to remove as much water as possible then place hat over an upside-down plastic colander or bowl while wool is still damp you can shape the beret trying it on to make sure the brim fits around the forehead comfortably the brim can be stretched gently only while it is still damp when the beret is the shape you want leave it to dry completely copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
